snippet: The failed Tokyo-based bitcoin exchange, Mt Gox, received court approval on Tuesday to begin Chapter 15 bankruptcy proceedings in the United States as it awaits approval of a settlement with U.S. customers and a sale of its business....

headline.print_headline: Failed Bitcoin Exchange Mt Gox Gets U.S. Bankruptcy Protection
headline.main: Failed Bitcoin Exchange Mt Gox Gets U.S. Bankruptcy Protection

lead_paragraph: The failed Tokyo-based bitcoin exchange, Mt Gox, received court approval on Tuesday to begin Chapter 15 bankruptcy proceedings in the United States as it awaits approval of a settlement with U.S. customers and a sale of its business.
